quote_last:
the Public Relation comes in with a ladies’ club following him. He claps his fat hands at the day-room door.
“Oh, hello, guys; stiff lip, stiff lip ... look around, girls; isn’t it clean, so bright? This is Miss Ratched. I chose this ward because it’s 𝘩𝘦𝘳 ward. She’s, girls, just like a mother. Not that I mean age, but you girls understand ...”
title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
author: Ken Kesey

quote_first: He checked on Anderson and saw she was still sleeping like a stone. Gardener had decided to wake Bobbi up by
quote_last: if she hadn’t awakened on her own.
title: The Tommyknockers
author: Stephen King

quote_first: “So be it, then,” replied the count; and extending his hand towards a calendar suspended near the chimney piece, he said, “today is the 21st of February”, and drawing out his watch, added, “it is
quote_last: . Now promise me to remember this, and expect me on the 21st of May at half past 10 in the forenoon.”
title: The Count of Monte Cristo
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote_last: , Kendra found herself on the couch again, this time with Christy. She felt uncomfortable sitting next to her, especially after the barrage of hate her coworkers had thrown at the blonde, but Christy seemed unusually approachable right then, all smiles and laughs and easy-flowing gestures.
title: Reprieve
author: James Han Mattson
